description:
The Cochrane Ranche Historic site is the original site of Senator Matthew Henry Cochrane's ranch, established in 1881.
Trail around the site passes a significant variety of terrain, prairie on the west side and forest on the east side. It's a pleasant and easy walk.
There can be muddy sections at north end of trail.
http://www.cochrane.ca/municipal/toc/webcms.nsf/AllDoc/BFB23B0D19B76DC
B87256EE1005CF085?
OpenDocument
directions: Heading west on Highway 1A, north side of road (right turn) just prior to the intersection of Highways 1A and 22.
title: Cochrane Ranche
